commands.exec: echo "RULESET PATH 1: You have selected a ${option.vm} machine with ${option.distro} distribution, version ${option.version}."
echo "RULESET PATH 2: You have selected a ${option.vm} machine with ${option.distro} distribution, version ${option.version}."
echo "You have selected a ${option.vm} machine with ${option.distro} distribution, version ${option.version}."

commands.script:
echo "RULESET PATH 1: You have selected a @option.vm@ machine with @option.distro@ distribution, version @option.version@."
echo "RULESET PATH 2: You have selected a @option.vm@ machine with @option.distro@ distribution, version @option.version@."
echo "You have selected a @option.vm@ machine with @option.distro@ distribution, version @option.version@."
